Reviews.Title: After a year this is still one of the BEST Blackberries to date!!!
Reviews.Author: Olaf Johnson
Reviews.Content: Great phone. If you have this phone and also carry something like an iPhone 5 or Samsung Android Galaxy 4 then you would literally have the most powerful pairing in mobile telephony in your pockets.PROS:> All 9790s come factory unlocked to accept Sim cards and work anywhere on this planet! What other phone does that?> Small. It not only fits in your denim jeans pocket but you will forget it is in there.> Powerful. Get the OS upgrades and you will find that this is a fast and smooth phone. It does everything well.> Free Mobile Hotspot. Can't beat that. It is free and FAST! You can add internet up to 5 devices. I've streamed entire Netflix movies via this phone onto my Smart HDTV and did NOT have one blip or hiccup!> QWERTY hard keyboard is still the best for texting, typing and emails. I have written out many 5-10 page papers for school on this phone and didn't even realize how many pages I have written until after printing it out or transferring it to a word document.> Good Auto Focus camera and video camera.> Good standard software and apps.> Fast and smooth movie and HD video playback. The sound is also REALLY GOOD!> Touch screen is awesome! It is smooth and the sensitivity is well balanced. Coming from a 9780 it took some time to get use to it but now I love it.> BBM still rules! I don't care how much you text on an iPhone or Android nothing beats the world accessibly of BBM.> LED Alerts are still very useful.> Very GOOD phone features. Most newer phones tend to bury phone features inside menus and apps but here the 9790 still remembers what it means to be a telephone.> Lots of skins, cases and accessories available on the world market for this phone. I had a tough time at first finding stuff for it in the USA market but once I went on eBay Canada and eBay UK there were hundreds of pages showing products for this device from battery extenders, cases, skins, desktop chargers, car hotspot chargers, etc...CONS:> All 9790s may come unlocked for phone calling BUT they are TWO types of 9790s that are 3G/4G/Data locked to specific Bands. The RED71UW 9790 use Bands 1,2,5, and 6 (AT&T;, Rogers and Telus) whiles REC71UW 9790 use Bands 1,4 and 8 (T-Mobile, O2, Wind, Mobilicity, UK carriers). This variation ONLY affects the 3G/4G Data Antenna and not the phone calling ability of the 9790. This isn't stated anywhere in the packaging or by most online merchants who simply state the 9790 comes unlocked. It is UNLOCKED for Sim cards and phone calling/texting but it is permanently LOCKED to a specific Band group and hence a LOCKED to specifics carriers if you need to use this for 3G/4G Data.> Blackberry Apps are EXPENSIVE. Some Apps, especially the productivity ones, can be as much a $79.99!> Blackberry Apps are lacking. DO NOT buy this phone for Apps! You will be 100% disappointed. There is no Instagram for one and many of those coupon Apps that require touch screens don't exist here. However the basic fare of Facebook, WhatApp, Twitter, eBay, YouTube, etc... all work well here and are all FREE!> No front facing camera. Being business savvy Blackberries in 2012/2013 should all come with hardware set up to cater to video conferencing and video chatting. This is something 10 years ago you would have thought that Blackberry would have done first and done by now.>No touch screen based unlock/lock screen apps. Or rather no decent apps for locking/unlocking the screen USING solely the touch screen (like you get with the Samsung Galaxy phones). There is one trial app that can screw up your phone power and memory usage when the trial-ware expires. It is only then you realize the 9790 actually doesn't have many apps that cater or enhance the touch screen feature that this phone does so well.> Screen can feel too small for extending movie watching. Media playback is easy to do and the sound quality is GREAT but the screen can be small for movie viewing. I just watched Pacific Rim on this 9790 and later when I saw it in theaters I realized there was a lot of detail I missed out on when I saw it on my phone.> I'm not sure how this is done but my 9790 does not provide Bluetooth streaming of music into my car. Although the bluetooth does extend over the voice dial features it does not automatically prompt for music streaming. Then again, I am not sure if this can be done via an app or OS upgrade. However the fact remains there is no bluetooth music streaming on this 9790 out of the box.Overall this is still a great phone. I have had it for over a year now and it still feels new in my pocket.

Reviews.Title: Good phone overall, but...
Reviews.Author: Ninson Mora
Reviews.Content: The Blackberry 9790 is certainly a featured-packed phone. The bad news about it is that battery life sucks!!! With a limited use, mostly placing/receiving calls, texting and instant messaging, battery needs charging everyday!!! That was kind of frustating. My previous phone was the BB 9700 and its battery used to last three to four times longer.

Reviews.Title: Faulty Phone
Reviews.Author: heather
Reviews.Content: It was not working properly from the first day that I received it, the battery was no good and the phone kept cutting out sometimes. The phone seemed to be a second hand phone and I was not pleased at all with it!

Reviews.Title: Brand New

Reviews.Content: The phone arrived one day early it brand spanking new. This phone is a big step up from my Bold 9700 and i love it the touchscreen is awesome and the physical keyboard is a perfect mix. Phone is just amazing.

Reviews.Title: Don't BUY this model
Reviews.Author: pavan
Reviews.Content: I'm using a BB from as long as I can remember. This model has basic issues like battery drain, Speaker turning on while on the phone, Emails disappearing-often. Very unhappy with this model.

Reviews.Title: The cellphone is not ok
Reviews.Author: Jorge L. Galvez Fujishima
Reviews.Content: The product has a problem: when there is no sim card in the phone the screen blinks every time, and some times comes an error message.The product seems to be repaired or refurbish.I wanted to send back the product, but I am yet in Peru and there is too much work to send back the product in the USA, so I will keep the product and tried to use with that problem: I hope that this is the only problem the cellphone has.I don't recommend the product.

Reviews.Content: The information on the technical details of the product are false. I was waiting for a phone that works in band 2 = 1900 MHz and I get one that works in the band 8 = 900 MHz. I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: BUYERS BEWARE ! USED ITEM !
Reviews.Author: AJN "AJN"
Reviews.Content: BUYERS BEWARE ! " ADVERTISED/LISTED AS NEW "When I opened the box the phone didn't come in a plastic bag, there was no protective peel off film over the screen. The other accessories were properly packaged except for the battery which showed signs of use. When you start up a blackberry for the first time it takes you to a setup menu. In this case it didn't. The screen saver was a Virgin Atlantic Logo which is never the case. There were dialed phone numbers in the dialed calls folder.There is a warranty but it probably won't be honoured. A dishonest seller !! "

Reviews.Title: RIP OFF!!! DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Mario Delascio
Reviews.Content: I bought this cellphone as gift to my godmother back home and I worked just A MONTH!!!!! could believe this??? I wrote to the seller and they just told me "SORRY THE MONTH TO REPLACE IT JUST PASSED, TRY WITH OTHER CABLE OR CHARGER" and they stopped to answered me my mails!!!!!! the cell it doest work, and I took it to a service and they told the cell it was  AND THEY SOLD TO ME AS NEW, SUCH A RIP OFF, I TOTALLY NOT RECOMMEND THEM. DO NOT BUY ANY ITEMS BECAUSE YOU GUYS GONNA LOSE THE MONEY FOR SURE

Reviews.Title: A piece of crap

Reviews.Content: As all Blackberrys....I am an iPhone user, i help a cousin (10 year old) to buy this phone as his own choice and against my advice. Well 2-3 months later he now regrets the purchase and lost that money, given the phone crashes and is really really slow with only about 10 apps installed.Blackberry, the only thing that is usefull is the PIN. The rest is garbage....

Reviews.Content: La presente es para saber cuales son las Bandas 3G de este equipo para poder utilizarlo en Venezuela con las operadoras de Movilnet o Moviestar y las Bandas de las mismas es 1900. Gracias por la atencion prestada..This is to know which are the 3G bands in order to use this equipment in Venezuela Movilnet operators or Moviestar and Bands of them is 1900. Thanks for your attention ..

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900 MHz frequencies and 3G bands are HSDPA 850 / 1900 / 2100 or HSDPA 900 / 1700 / 2100, depending on the cellphone version. Check the description in seller condition or ask seller.
2.45-Inch High resolution color TFT display, 480x360 pixels, 246 dpi; 5MP Camera, 2592x1944 pixels, autofocus, LED flash; VGA video recording (640x480); QWERTY Keypad; Optical track pad; MP3/MP4 Player; 3.5mm Audio Jack and Document viewer/editor.
BlackBerry OS 7.0; Processor: Marvel Tavor MG1 1 GHz; Internal Memory: 768 MB RAM, 8 GB eMMC; MicroSD Card slot expendable up to 32GB; Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n UMA support; GPS with A-GPS support; BlackBerry Maps and Bluetooth v2.1 with A2DP, EDR.
Talk time up to 5h 10min (2G)/Up to 5h 20min (3G) - Stand-by up to 432h (2G)/Up to 408h (3G)
ProductInfo.Name: BlackBerry Bold 9790 Unlocked 3G GSM Phone with 2.45-Inch Touch Screen, 5MP Camera, GPS, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi - US Warranty - Black
